help.txt.content:
Available Commands:
==================

help     - Show this help message
ls       - List files and directories
cat      - Display file contents (usage: cat <filename>)
cd       - Change directory (usage: cd <directory>)
pwd      - Print working directory
clear    - Clear terminal or history (usage: clear <terminal|history>)
whoami   - Display current user
date     - Show current date and time
echo     - Print text (usage: echo <text>)

Fun Commands:
matrix.exe   - Enter the Matrix (press Q to exit)
snake.exe    - Play Snake game
banner   - Display ASCII art banner
neofetch - Show system information
theme    - Change terminal theme (usage: theme <name>)

Navigation:
- Use TAB for autocomplete
- Use UP/DOWN arrows for command history
- Type partial command and press TAB to complete

portfolio.txt.content:
Portfolio Website
=================

A personal portfolio that expands beond a traditional 2D site.
It is a 3D representation of my hobbies, skills, and projects.
It utilises THREE.js for 3D graphics and animations, providing an immersive experience.

Technologies:
- Three.js/WebGL
- HTML5/CSS3
- JavaScript
- Vite
- NES.css
- Blender


Features:
- Responsive design
- Interactive 3D elements
- Smooth animations
- SEO optimized
- Immersive Navigation
- Game-like experience

Live Demo: https://nathanperrier.dev
GitHub: https://github.com/nathanperrier/portfolio

waypoint.txt.content:
Waypoint
===================

A web-based AR navigation app that helps users find their way around the UQ campus.
It uses AR.js for augmented reality features and integrates with Mapbox API for navigation.

Designed With Figma.
2025 BFI Hackathon Contestant.

Technologies:
- Frontend: Framework7, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- Backend: JavaScript, Mapbox API

Features:
- Augmented reality navigation
- Real-time location tracking
- Interactive map
- Responsive design
- User-friendly interface

Figma Design: https://www.figma.com/design/293ut4QDPxDpbgxyqYjkgJ/waypoint?node-id=0-1&t=YP5OwvRdEvPU54Rh-1
GitHub: https://github.com/nathanperrier/waypoint

moistmeter.txt.content:
MoistMeter
===================

An agriculture app that helps farmers monitor soil moisture levels and optimize and automate irrigation.

2025 SIC Hackathon Winner.

Technologies:
- Flutter
- Firebase
- Mapbox API
- Agrisense API

GitHub: https://github.com/nathanperrier/moistmeter
